articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Message to Hu Jintao
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Message to Hu Jintao
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, Monday sent a message to Hu Jintao, general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party and president of China, in reply to his message.
					 It said:
					
					 I extend deep thanks to you for sending warm congratulatory messages to me on my election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of our party and government to invariably develop the traditional DPRK-China friendship provided and cultivated by the leaders of elder generations of the two countries.
					
					 I believe that the DPRK-China friendship would develop on good terms in the future, too, by joint efforts of both sides as desired by the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I would like to wish the Chinese people greater achievements in the work for building a harmonious socialist society under the leadership of the Communist Party of China with you as general secretary, and you good health and happiness.

articles.title: KPA Supreme Command Warns Lee Myung Bak Group of Quick Action
articles.content:
KPA Supreme Command Warns Lee Myung Bak Group of Quick Action
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The special operation action group of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army issued the following notice Monday: 
					 The indignation of the army and people of the DPRK at the group of rat-like Lee Myung Bak is running high.
					
					 Shouts "Destroy", "Beat to death" and "Tear to death" are ringing out on this land.
					
					 But the Lee group of traitors is still doing mischiefs, not coming to its senses.
					
					 On April 20 they toured the "Institute for Unification Studies", den of rats, in Suyu-dong, Kangbuk District, Seoul where they called for "orienting to system change in the north" if it does not give up its nuclear and missile ambitions, saying that "what is needed for the north now is not only bread but individual freedom and human rights". They have gone so impudent as to assert that "co-op farms should be disorganized and agricultural reform be effected to help improve the livelihood of the citizens in the north".
					
					 On April 19 they appeared in the puppet Scientific Institute for National Defense where they heaped praises on a few poor-looking missiles, saying they have precision and power enough to immediately strike any part of the DPRK, inviolable land. They had temerity of dare talking about "striking the supreme headquarters through office window".
					
					 Puppet Defense Minister Kim Kwan Jin and other military warmongers danced to the tune.
					
					 The situation proves that the group of traitors has long lost its reasoning power.
					
					 In the meantime, paid conservative media which had long been reduced to a waiting maid of the group of traitors, worked with blood-shot eyes to build up public opinion in favor of the rats' group.
					
					 Involved in the campaign were Dong-A Ilbo situated in the downtown Seoul as well as KBS, MBC, YTN and other media institutions. 
					
					 The Lee group should have apologized for its high treasons tens of thousands of times and chosen death by itself.
					
					 This group is, however, challenging the north, grinding its teeth.
					
					 In view of the situation getting graver as the days go by, the KPA Supreme Command special operation action group issues the following notice upon authorization:
					
					 The special actions of our revolutionary armed forces will start soon to meet the reckless challenge of the group of traitors.
					
					 Those actions are an eruption of the public anger and resentment and a sacred war of all service personnel and people to protect the dignity of our supreme leadership.
					
					 Their targets are the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, the arch criminals, and the group of rat-like elements including conservative media destroying the mainstay of the fair public opinion.
					
					 Once the above-said special actions kick off, they will reduce all the rat-like groups and the bases for provocations to ashes in three or four minutes, in much shorter time, by unprecedented peculiar means and methods of our own style.
					
					 Our revolutionary armed forces do not make an empty talk.

articles.title: FM Spokesman Slams US Undisguised Double Standards
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Slams US Undisguised Double Standards
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Monday issued the following statement:
					 The hypocrisy and shamelessness of the double standards applied by the U.S. recently under the pretext of ensuring world peace and security have been brought to light to become the target of the international community's criticism. 
					
					 The U.S. malignantly slandered the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes which was conducted in a transparent manner from A to Z as "a long-range missile launch" and spearheaded a campaign for "protesting" against it for no reason. The U.S., however, backed other country's open launch of a long-range missile, sparking off international furor. 
					
					 When the U.S. came under fire by world people for this behavior, it let loose such sophism as that country posed no problem as it properly abided by international law but the DPRK posed a problem as it failed to do so. 
					
					 As far as the observation of international law is concerned, it is the U.S. that took the lead in meeting its own interests in disregard of the UNSC resolution, its own making, and much-touted NPT when something runs counter to its interests. 
					
					 What matters here, in essence, is the U.S. application of its double standards whereby it asserts any country which does not obey it should be barred from developing anything for peaceful purposes, to say nothing of bolstering defence capability while any country friendly to it is allowed to have access either to nuclear weapons or long-range missiles. 
					
					 No wonder, even Western media deplored American logic that what matters is not what one does but who does anything and termed its attitude of distinguishing legality from illegality according to the difference between systems as a clear expression of double standards. 
					
					 It is the trite method of the U.S. that it resorts to high-handed and arbitrary practices in defiance of international law and the UN when it considers any situation unfavorable to it and when it wants to pull up others, it cooks up unreasonable resolutions in a coercive manner by abusing the authority of the UNSC. 
					
					 A typical example of this is UNSC Resolutions 1718 and 1874 fabricated by the U.S. These are the height of the application of the double standards as they were illegally cooked up in wanton violation of the universally accepted international law stipulating that "space shall be freely developed and used by all states without any distinction" and the principle of equal sovereignty provided for in the UN Charter. 
					
					 The U.S. application of the double standards is, in the final analysis, a product of its hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 It is the inveterate habit of the U.S. to view everything done by the DPRK from a conception of confrontation. It has systematically abused the UN for internationalizing its hostile policy which calls for unconditionally holding in check both the DPRK's use of nuclear energy and space development for peaceful purposes under the pretext that they may lead to bolstering up its military capability, a threat to the U.S. 
					
					 The UNSC is abused for implementing the hostile policy towards the DPRK under the influence of the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices and the UN Secretary General reelected, backed by the American master, plays the role of a shock brigade in attacking the DPRK, revealing the true colors as a servant of the U.S. This is the present regretful reality. 
					
					 All facts go to prove that only when a country is strong enough, it can defend justice and dynamically promote global independence and that the road of independence, the road of Songun chosen by the DPRK is entirely just.

articles.title: CPRK Warns Rat-like Lee Myung Bak Group of Its Most Miserable End
articles.content:
CPRK Warns Rat-like Lee Myung Bak Group of Its Most Miserable End
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Monday issued its information bulletin No. 995 lashing out at traitor Lee Myung Bak for again letting loose a spate of provocative remarks gravely hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system in a special lecture on "north policy" on April 20.
					 It branded this as another grave provocation of maniac keen on confrontation with fellow countrymen and the most despicable pro-U.S. sycophantic remarks and jargons made by an old man more dead than alive. 
					
					 The information bulletin went on:
					
					 The traitor let loose stupid rhetoric, while seriously hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system and shamelessly pointing an accusing finger to it. 
					
					 The above-said ridiculous behavior is nothing but the last-ditch efforts made by those who are extremely irritated by the frustration of their foolish dreams in face of the striking demonstration of the high prestige and tremendous national power of the DPRK and its single-minded unity and powerful military capabilities, in particular, through the celebrations of the Day of the Sun and the lively response evoked by them among domestic and world public. 
					
					 It was aimed at improving even a bit the Lee's poor position after being hit hard by service personnel and people of the DPRK for his thrice-cursed crimes committed against the nation and saving his face. 
					
					 The mischief made by rat-like Lee Myung Bak against them reminds one of a rabid dog barking towards the sky. What Lee uttered is no more than squeaks made by the rat before being killed by all people for its wrong doings. 
					
					 Now the army and people of the DPRK are shaking with towering indignation and anger and their resolution to wipe out the Lee group is running high. 
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK have already declared their special actions. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will make rat-like Lee and his group meet the most miserable and disgraceful end for doing such mischief in rat holes as defaming the sun.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates President of East Timor
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates President of East Timor
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a congratulatory message to Taur Matan Ruak upon his election as president of East Timor.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and East Timor would grow stronger in conformity with the common interests and desire of the peoples of the two countries and sincerely wished him success in his responsible work.

articles.title: State Councilor of China on Sino-DPRK Friendship
articles.content:
State Councilor of China on Sino-DPRK Friendship
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, who is heading a delegation of the WPK on a visit to China met with Dai Bingguo, state councilor of the People's Republic of China, at the Diaoyutai State Guesthouse in Beijing on Sunday.
					 Dai Bingguo said the Korean people lost their great leader and the Chinese people lost their great friend, adding General Secretary Kim Jong Il would be always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and the Chinese people and they will miss him forever.
					
					 Dai Bingguo noted that the Sino-DPRK friendship associated with the wisdom and energies of the leaders of the several generations of the two countries is very precious assets for the two countries and common strategic property as it is the friendship sealed in blood which stood the test of history.
					
					 It is the consistent strategic policy of the Chinese party and government to cement the Sino-DPRK friendship and there will be neither change nor vacillation in implementing the policy, he stressed.

articles.title: Cote d'Ivoire President on Friendly Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Cote d'Ivoire President on Friendly and Cooperative Relations with DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Jong Hak Se, DPRK ambassador to Cote d'Ivoire, presented his credentials to its President Alassane Ouattara on April 12.
					 The president warmly congratulated the dear respected Kim Jong Un upon his election to the top post of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 I am pleased that everything is going well in the DPRK, the president said, expressing expectation that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Congratulations from Foreign Political Party Leaders
articles.content:
Congratulations from Foreign Political Party Leaders
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received congratulatory messages from political party leaders of several countries on April 12 and 13 on his election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). They were Gwede Mantashe, secretary general of the African National Congress of South Africa, and Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico.
					 The messages warmly congratulated Kim Jong Un upon his election as first secretary of the WPK, saying it is a token of the trust of the Korean people and the party members in him.
					
					 They sincerely hoped that Kim Jong Un will provide wise guidance to the Korean people in their heroic struggle to turn the DPRK into a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Mamadou Lamin Thiam, national permanent secretary of the Democratic Party of Senegal, sent a message of greeting to Kim Jong Un on April 12 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He in the message wished Kim Jong Un greater successes in his responsible work for the reunification of the country and the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: Gift from Taiwan Businessman
articles.content:
Gift from Taiwan Businessman
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from the general director of Taiwan Protax International Corp., who came to the DPRK on the occasion of the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned by General Director Liu Tzu Shen.

articles.title: Protest Rallies Held in Jagang Province, Rason City
articles.content:
Protest Rallies Held in Jagang Province, Rason City
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons and people in Jagang Province and Rason City of the DPRK met on Monday to vow to wipe out the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group in this land and sky.
					 Present there were officials of party and power organs and working people's organizations, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, people of different social standings and youth and students in the province and city.
					
					 The statement issued by a spokesman for the KPA Supreme Command was read out to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers said that they could never pardon the rat-like Lee group who hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK by mobilizing elder reactionaries no better than paupers, gangster-like students and ultra-right conservative media persons.
					
					 The strong revolutionary armed forces of Mt. Paektu will search every rat hole and hang the whole rat-like Lee group, the sworn enemy, till all of them are dried up and perish, they declared. 
					
					 The rat-like Lee group will bitterly experience what severe final punishment the merciless sacred war launched by the DPRK will mete out to them for the indelible crimes they have committed so far, they noted. 
					
					 Service persons and people will beat to death the Lee group and blow up their bases for provocations and build on this land a reunified thriving nation shining with the august name of the great sun.
					
					  Then followed protest demonstrations.

articles.title: Meetings Held to Vow Take Revenge upon Lee Group of Traitors
articles.content:
Meetings Held to Vow Take Revenge upon S. Korean Regime
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers and women of the DPRK held meetings outside the House of Class Education in Susan-ri, Kangso District and the National House of Class Education on Monday to vow to beat to death the group of rat-like Lee Myung Bak.
					 A statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army was read out to be followed by speeches.
					
					 Speakers denounced the group of traitors for perpetrating such thrice-cursed crimes as daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK over the celebrations of the Day of the Sun. 
					
					 They said no matter what awful mischief rat-like group of traitors may commit, they cannot block the advance of the powerful country shining thanks to the cause of the sun and the might of Songun.
					
					 The world will clearly see what miserable end the hideous provocateurs will meet in face of the just sacred war of retaliation to be waged by the army and people of the DPRK to devotedly protect their Supreme Commander, they noted.
					
					 If Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un issues an order they, alongside service persons of the Korean People's Army, will wipe out the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group, the sworn enemy, and achieve the historic cause of the country's reunification without fail, they said.
					
					 The declaration of revenge was made public and a poem to take revenge upon the enemy was recited at the meetings.

articles.title: Young Vanguard Vow to Carry Forward Cause of Songun Revolution
articles.content:
Young Vanguard Vow to Carry Forward Cause of Songun Revolution
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Members of the young vanguard held an oath-taking meeting before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Monday. 
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues and bowed in deep reverence for them. They vowed to glorify the Songun revolutionary feats of Kim Jong Il and remain true to the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that after embarking upon the road of revolution at his young age, the President founded the Juche idea and performed undying feats in building revolutionary armed forces by firmly maintaining the idea and line of attaching importance to arms.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who successfully carried forward the President's cause of army-building, pursued the unique Songun politics, making a great contribution to the development of Juche-based revolutionary armed forces, they said, adding:
					
					 Under the care of Kim Jong Il the young people have fully displayed the spirit and honor of being young vanguard of Songun in the gigantic drive for defending the country and building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 They called on all young people to carry forward and accomplish the Juche Songun revolution started in the forest of Mt. Paektu under the leadership of Kim Jong Un representing their destiny and future, true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They underscored the need for the young people to always keep themselves in an alerted and mobilized posture to shatter the reckless moves of the U.S. imperialists and rat-like Lee Myung Bak group to ignite a war. Once the Supreme Commander issues an order, we will wipe out aggressors to the last man and achieve the historic cause of national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, without fail, they concluded.

articles.title: DPRK People's Indignation Runs High at S. Korean Regime
articles.content:
DPRK People's Indignation Runs High at S. Korean Regime
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- All servicepersons and people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea hardly repress their surging indignation at south Korea's Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, upon receiving the statement of the spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army, which discloses its smear campaign against the DPRK. 
					 Ri Yong Il, a KPA officer, told KCNA:
					
					 "As one of servicepersons, I can not hold in check myself for the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group's insult to the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership.
					
					 Now I am in a mind to shower this group with fire to ashes so that rat-faced Lee can never open his mouth daringly squeaking towards the sky."
					
					 Pae Kwang Suk, a woman living in Central District, Pyongyang, said:
					
					 "There is a saying that anyone who swims against public sentiment does not live his own life.
					
					 I would like to trample down rat-like Lee Myung Bak to death. His face reminds me of a rat that gnaws at everything wherever it goes."
					
					 Ryang Chol Hui, a student at Pyongyang Teacher Training College, said:
					
					 "The term the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group of traitors infuriates me.
					
					 It is a disgrace to the Korean nation to leave alive this group of rats, which do only harms to others while rummaging in a ditch.
					
					 And, the wicked conservative media, including Dong-A Ilbo, should be wiped out along with rat Myung Bak."

articles.title: DPRK People Enraged at S. Korean Regime's Provocative Moves
articles.content:
DPRK People Enraged at S. Korean Regime's Provocative Moves
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak and his group of south Korea seriously hurt the social system of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the dignity of its supreme leadership again some days ago.
					 He even took issue with the slogan "Let Us Live Our Own Way!", a reflection of the DPRK people's faith and will, by blustering that the dismantlement of nuclear weapons and reform, opening and change are the only way out for the north.
					
					 Meanwhile, the traitor egged riff-raffs on to fire at the images representing the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership and hurt the portraits of the great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Such hideous behaviors have slashed the DPRK people into irrepressible fury.
					
					 Ro Pok Gun, secretary of the Pothonggang District, Pyongyang City, Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, told KCNA:
					
					 "Now is the time to burst out pent-up rages. The rat-like Lee Myung Bak group, who has only committed crimes against the history and the nation, is making a last-ditch effort to preserve the remainder of its dirty life.
					
					 The latest insult to the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership is an expression of hysteria of the group seized with insanity, and this can never be tolerated.
					
					 The group of traitors will suffer disastrous retaliation from the angry DPRK people."
					
					 Pak Song Chol, department director of the Ministry of Public Health, said:
					
					 "The DPRK boasts of the close unity of the army and people around the dear respected Kim Jong Un, which is mightier than nuke or inter-continental ballistic missile.
					
					 The rat-like Lee Myung Bak group of philistines knowing nothing but money will never understand this.
					
					 I will not feel relieved even if I tear them to death.
					
					 They all should be taken away from the earth."
					
					 Pak Su Gil, a teacher at Kim Il Sung University, said:
					
					 "The smear campaign, launched by the puppet group, is a last-ditch effort of those shocked by the might of the DPRK people's unity around their leader and its tremendous military power.
					
					 The group of rats will never be able to evade the most miserable end."

articles.title: Meetings in DPRK Mark KPA Anniversary
articles.content:
Meetings in DPRK Mark KPA Anniversary
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Heroes and a wife of hero met with members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea and the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Meetings were separately held at the Women's Hall and the Central Hall of Workers on Monday.
					
					 Labor Hero Kim Ok Sun said at the meeting with members of the women's union that President Kim Il Sung saw to it that women workers had recreation abroad during the days of hard-fought war, calling for taking good care of their health despite the difficult situation of war.
					
					 Ri Un Gyong, vice-director of Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School who is wife of hero Kil Yong Jo, said that leader Kim Jong Il gave her great favor, saying that she looks fine as she wears military uniform after her husband died and the Korean women have had strong will from the olden times.
					
					 Pak Yu Sun, member of the women's union in Chukjon-dong No. 1, Mangyongdae District, told a touching story, deeply impressing the participants. She said that there was no end in the loving care shown by the peerlessly great men as they let her son, who died in the course carrying out his combat duty, live an eternal life by putting him forward as hero of the DPRK, naming the school attended by him as Kim Ju Hyok Secondary School and building his bust.
					
					 Hero of the DPRK Pak Chan Su, lecturer of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, said at the meeting with members of the trade unions that the brave soldiers of the People's Army humbled the U.S. imperialists who were boasting of being "the strongest" in the world and brought about a historic victory under the leadership of Kim Il Sung in the period of the past Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 He said that the People's Army is fully displaying its might as it has held Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, heaven-sent great man of Mt. Paektu, in high esteem.
					
					 He called for wiping out rat-like Lee group in this land and sky and accomplishing the historic cause of national reunification.

articles.title: International Festival Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
International Festival Held in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- An international festival took place at the Yanggakdo International Hotel in Pyongyang to mark the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Present there were a number of foreigners, including representatives of the international and national preparatory committees for commemorating the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, delegations and delegates of different countries and international organizations, those who had honor of being received by the President and leader Kim Jong Il and their descendants and dignitaries of various countries.
					
					 The festival lauded the undying feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and strikingly displayed the reverence of the world's progressives for them.
					
					 Speakers at an international meeting for supporting Korea's reunification elaborated on Kim Il Sung's devoted efforts for Korea's sovereignty and independence and cause of global independence.
					
					 They referred to the energetic activities Kim Jong Il conducted for the peace and reunification of Korea under the banner of Songun (military-first) politics.
					
					 Meanwhile, the festival participants visited Kim Il Sung's old home in Mangyongdae in Pyongyang, where they laid a floral basket in their joint name and planted memorial trees around the home.
					
					Chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association Wu Donghe said the visit to Mangyongdae makes his yearning for the President run higher.
					
					 "Kim Il Sung, the greatest person in the world, will always remain alive in the hearts of the world people," he stressed.
					
					 They also had a gathering in front of Kim Jong Il's old home in the secret camp of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association Christer Lundgren, who is chairman of the Nordic preparatory committee for commemorating Kim Il Sung's 100th birth anniversary and chairman of the Swedish national preparatory committee for commemorating Kim Il Sung's 100th birth anniversary, said at the gathering:
					
					 "Kim Jong Il's devoted efforts for the country and the wellbeing of the people strike all people to the hearts.
					
					 His undying feats will remain long with the history of Kim Il Sung's Korea."
					
					 They toured the venue of the 14th Kimilsungia Festival and held an international joint meeting for celebrating Kim Il Sung's 100th birth anniversary and a joint friendship gathering.
					
					 DPRK orders and medals were awarded to foreign personages during the festival.

articles.title: Mt. Kumgang, DPRK's Tourist Destination
articles.content:
Mt. Kumgang, DPRK's Tourist Destination
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Mt. Kumgang, known as one of the world's sceneries, is situated on the east coast in the central part of Korea.
					 The mountain boasts of many scenic spots, the Lagoon Samil in particular, fantastic rocks and cliffs, crystal-like water meandering rocks, rainbow-forming waterfalls and varieties of animals and plants.
					
					 From April 13, the Harbin-Mt. Kumgang International Tourists Group by chartered plane toured the mountain for three nights and four days.
					
					 Sea Kumgang, Kuryong Falls and myriads of peaks were great attractions for the tourists.
					
					 Wang Guiyun (68), a woman residing in Harbin City, China, told KCNA that she was fascinated by the scenery of Mt. Kumgang. "Back home, I will tell my impressions to others so that they can enjoy the scenery of Mt. Kumgang," she said.
					
					 Noting that he felt refreshed at the scenery of Sea Kumgang, You Juncheng (55), a member of the group, said:
					
					  "During our stay, we attended various events held in celebration of President Kim Il Sung's 100th birth anniversary. 
					
					 I believe that the friendship between China and the DPRK will be everlasting."
					
					 In the meantime, the group bought souvenirs at the Kumgangsan Exhibition and Kwangmyong Duty-free Shop, while enjoying the performance given by the Pyongyang Moranbong Circus in the tourist resort.

articles.title: DPRK Experiences Heavy Rain, Accompanied by Stormy Wind, Tidal Waves
articles.content:
DPRK Experiences Heavy Rain, Accompanied by Stormy Wind, Tidal Waves
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Heavy rainfall hit overall parts of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on April 21-22, triggered by low pressure that came from the sky above lower reaches of China's Changjiang River.
					 Hardest hit were South Hwanghae, Kangwon and South Hamgyong provinces and some areas of North Phyongan and North Hwanghae provinces.
					
					 Sinchon County witnessed 102 mm rainfall, Sepho County 92 mm, Munchon City 80 mm, Hoeyang County 79 mm, Chonnae and Kosong counties 78 mm respectively, Sudong District 74 mm and Rakwon County 72 mm.
					
					 Haeju City and Ryongyon County experienced strong wind 16 meters per second, Unryul and Singye counties 15 m/s, Jangyon County 14 m/s and most areas of South and North Hwanghae and Kangwon provinces 10 m/s. 
					
					 Meanwhile, tidal waves swept some east coastal areas on Sunday, with water-level in the sea off Pochon-ri, Myongchon County, North Hamgyong Province rising 58 centimeters, in the sea off Thongchon County, Kangwon Province 52 centimeters and in the sea off Riwon County, South Hamgyong Province 36 centimeters.
					
					 Such phenomena are believed to be unusual in spring season in Korea.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Chinese People's Association for Peace and Disarmament led by Vice-President Li Wuwei visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday.
					 The members of the delegation laid a floral basket before the statues and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 The delegation arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Okayama Prefecture for Japan-Korea friendship led by Seisuke Mihara, representative of the Association for Promotion of Friendship between Japan and North and South Korea, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to pay tribute to them on Monday. 
					 The guests laid bouquets before the statues before bowing to them.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Visits Old Home of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Visits Old Home of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Okayama Prefecture for Japan-Korea friendship headed by Seisuke Mihara, representative of the Association for Promotion of Friendship between Japan and North and South Korea, visited the old home of President Kim Il Sung in Mangyongdae on Monday.
					 At the home the visitors looked round historical relics preserved with care, being briefed on the great revolutionary career of the President and the family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 They had a photo taken before the old home.
					
					 The head of the delegation said that the President liberated Korea and built socialism, expressing hope that the Korean people would register great achievements in the cause of reunifying the country and building a thriving nation, true to his behests.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Hana Music Information Center, the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital, Moranbong Secondary School No. 1 and other places.

articles.title: Graduates from Secondary School Volunteer to Work at Ryongyang Mine
articles.content:
Graduates from Secondary School Volunteer to Work at Ryongyang Mine
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Jo Jang Hyang and 7 sisters and brothers, graduates from Pyongyang Munsin Secondary School, volunteered to work at the Ryongyang Mine in Paekgumsan situated in the eastern part of Korea. They lost their parents during the Arduous March. Ri Yong Nyo, who took care of them like their mother since then, decided to go to the mine with her children displaying ardent patriotism. 
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un showed warm loving care and deep trust in them, highly praising their good deeds. 
					
					 A farewell ceremony took place at the Central Youth Hall on Monday. 
					
					 Speakers at the ceremony warmly congratulated them leaving the difficult and labor-consuming work site in hearty response to the call of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 The volunteers pledged to be innovators remembered and praised by the country and its people as befitting sons and daughters of Pyongyang, following the example set by the agitator in Hero Excavator No. 7 Workteam of the mine.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, the participants gave bouquets to them, warmly sending them off.

articles.title: Chinese Artiste with Special Memory of DPRK
articles.content:
Chinese Artiste with Special Memory of DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Liu Xiaona is an introducer of the Chinese art troupe (Song and Dance Ensemble of the General Political Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army) which attended the 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival in Pyongyang. 
					 She took part in the festival several times and was honored to give a performance in the presence of leader Kim Jong Il in April 2002.
					
					 Kim Jong Il met leading actors and actresses of the ensemble and had a photo session with them.
					
					 She would never forget the happy day all her life, Liu Xiaona told KCNA.
					
					 She further said:
					
					 It is my high honor to have participated in the significant festival held to mark the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung, who built a wonderful country where the people lead a happy life.
					
					 Whenever I come to the DPRK, I feel particular kindness and deep friendship.
					
					 We revere President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 I hope that the friendship between the army and people of the two countries will be inherited down through generations and remain forever.

articles.title: Mongolian Ensemble Attractive in April Art Festival
articles.content:
Mongolian Ensemble Attractive in April Art Festival
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Song and Dance Ensemble of the Mongolian Army gave its performance at the Central Youth Hall in Pyongyang for the 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival. It is one of the troupes which have taken part in the festival many times.
					 The ensemble presented as the first program of its performance to the recent festival "Song of Loyalty", one of the five Korean songs it prepared with sincerity.
					
					 Before their performance, the performers made a military salute with mind to pay regards to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Through the performances, they sang of the greatness of the President and the leader.
					
					 In particular, Ch. Bayarma, a female singer of the ensemble, gave deep impression to the audience by well singing Korea's masterpiece "Where Are You, Dear General?"
					
					 She, who has attended the festival six times until now, said after watching the opening performance of the 28th Festival:
					
					 "It was a wonderful performance of the highest level, with great compass and solemn orchestral music.
					
					 The Korean art is really admirable, and it urges us to further improve our performance preparations for the festival."
					
					 After all, the ensemble won high acclamation from the audience for its excellent performance.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Performs Great Feats in Building Army
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Performs Great Feats in Building Army
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- April 25 will mark the 80th birthday of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 With the birthday approaching, the Korean people pay highest tribute to President Kim Il Sung, who founded and developed the armed forces.
					
					 On April 25, Juche 21 (1932), he founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA). The founding was tantamount to a declaration of war against the Japanese imperialists, as it solemnly declared the birth of a main unit capable of leading the overall Korean revolution.
					
					 Under his command, the KPRA waged an anti-Japanese armed struggle for 15 years, eventually defeating the Japanese aggressor forces to attain the country's liberation.
					
					 After the country's liberation, the President considered the building of regular forces to be an urgent task and paid big efforts to its materialization.
					
					 His energetic guidance led to the founding of the Pyongyang Institute and the Central Security Officers School, which served as bases for training military cadres.
					
					 From October 1945 onward, the President came to a munitions factory in Phyongchon-ri, Pyongyang on several occasions to inspire the workers to boost weaponry production.
					
					 In those days, the KPRA had developed into the regular armed forces, the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Under his wise leadership, the KPA defeated the U.S. imperialists, who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world, in the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953).
					
					 The victory in the war was absolutely attributable to his Juche-based military idea, strategy and tactics and his outstanding commanding art. 
					
					 After the war, the President pressed ahead with economic and defence building on a simultaneous basis, while devoting tireless efforts to bolstering the KPA. 
					
					 His inspection tour of KPA units of three services extends to 182 668 kilometers, covering 3 120 units.
					
					 The undying feats Kim Il Sung performed for the development of the army will remain long in the history of the country.

articles.title: Male Guitar Quartet Popular among Audience
articles.content:
Male Guitar Quartet Popular among Audience
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The male guitar quartet of the Song and Dance Ensemble of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces has become popular among the audience for its well-organized vocal ensemble and skilful rendition.
					 The quartet began to be known to the local people in Juche 84 (1995). It is characterized by the harmonization of vocal and guitar ensembles.
					
					 It made its debut at the 14th World Festival of Youth and Students held in Cuba in 1997. It also enjoyed acclamation in China, Russia, Spain and Italy.
					
					 Noted professors at the Italian Guitarists Association admired the quartet as a unique one hardly to be found in European countries.
					
					 The song "Glory to Kim Jong Il" the quartet presented with the chorus of the female musicians Anakaona of Cuba was highly acclaimed at the grand performance for celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung "We Will Live Forever, Holding Leader in High Esteem".

articles.title: KCNA Slams Rat-like Lee Myung Group's Provocations
articles.content:
KCNA Slams S. Korean Regime's Provocations
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The rat-like group of bastards living in ditches in the area along the River Han are persisting in their mischief.
					  Aged reactionaries affiliated to the "Association of Elders of the Republic of Korea" who are more dead than alive, and gangster students ignorant of the world are going reckless, risking their lives.
					
					  They put up effigies allegedly representing the supreme leadership of the DPRK in different places including Kwanghwamun square in Seoul and got off such hysteria as firing at them.
					
					 Vicious conservative media including Dong-A Ilbo did not hesitate to deliberately defame the image representing the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 All these provocations were conceived and manipulated by the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group at a ditch of Chongwadae.
					
					 The insult to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK is the worst of the criminal moves to escalate the confrontation with compatriots as they were the unprecedentedly hideous provocations. 
					
					 This insult lashed the army and people of the DPRK into the greatest fury as they regard the dignity of the supreme leadership as dearer than their own lives.
					
					 No matter how mischievious the rat-like group is going, it can never shade the bright sun.
					
					 The world is watching with admiration and envy the DPRK where the great sun in the 21st century rose. 
					
					 The south Korean people also feel proud and honored to see the glorious tradition of the nation given steady continuity with the appearance of the peerless young leader.
					
					 The army and the people of the DPRK are united ever closer around the sun, encouraged by mankind's warm congratulations and best wishes.
					
					 Taken aback by this tremendous might and the advent of the new stirring era, the above-said bastards are shaking their fists against the sun. They are the top-class criminals who should never be forgiven.
					
					  Those who hurt the noblest and most sacred dignity of the supreme leadership of the nation should not expect to go scot-free in this land and sky.
					
					 The historic advance toward the new century of the nation is bound to be accompanied by a sacred war to wipe out a tiny handful of rat-like group.
					
					 Our retaliation will prove to be the most powerful strikes to take merciless revenge upon the hideous provocateurs, whoever they may be and wherever they are, and blow up everything.
					
					 Only then the nation will expect true peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams US Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams US Human Rights Abuses
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The European Parliament recently opened to public information about the places that housed secret prisons of the CIA and deportation of prisoners. The Supreme Court of Poland ruled that information about secret cooperation between the Intelligence Bureau of its Ministry of Home Affairs and the CIA in setting up secret prisons should be officially handed to its Supreme Prosecutor's Office.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 Human rights abuses perpetrated by the U.S. behind the curtain of "anti-terror war" should be disclosed before the whole world and should face a stern punishment by human conscience.
					
					 The U.S. set up such prisons overseas with an aim to commit horrible human rights abuses in secrecy, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Not a few pieces of information about how cruelly the U.S. has treated inmates of its secret prisons overseas so far have been disclosed.
					
					 What merits more serious attention is that torture was officially allowed there.
					
					 It had been known already that six days after the Sept. 11, 2001 incident the U.S. administration approved the regulations on the operation of secret prisons overseas and, accordingly, the CIA issued an instruction on building the above-said prisons and allowing torture there.
					
					 This goes to prove that the issue of the U.S. operation of its secret prisons is a state-sponsored organized crime. 
					
					 It is only the U.S. that set up secret prisons similar to Nazi concentration camps and legally allowed torture, pursuant to a national policy after the Second World War. The above-said human rights abuses put into the shade the atrocities perpetrated by fascist Germany which won ill-fame in history.
					
					 The U.S. has talked this or that about human rights of other countries in its annual "report on human rights" though it took the lead in committing human rights abuses stunning the world. This is a political caricature inviting derision of all people.
					
					 With nothing can the U.S. conceal its true colors as the worst human rights abuser.

articles.title: US MD Is Not for Defense: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
US MD Is Not for Defense: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is intent on establishing missile defense system (MD) in Northeast Asia and Mid-east under the signboard of "defense". It is even making far-fetched assertion that the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes was a long-range missile launch.
					 An aim sought by the U.S. is to make "threats" from the DPRK a fait accompli and justify its MD moves for world domination, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined article.
					
					 The U.S. says that the global MD is to thwart missile attacks from the DPRK and Iran but this is just a lame excuse, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. deployed interceptor missiles in Poland and Romania and radar in Turkey and Aegis in Spain as part of its moves to establish MD in the whole of Europe allegedly to ward off missiles from the DPRK and Iran. This does not stand to reason. The U.S. is even thinking expanding missile defense network as far as Australia from Alaska encompassing south Korea and Japan. This is sophism which can convince no one.
					
					 The U.S. moves have escalated arms race among big powers, prompting other countries to buckle down to bolstering deterrence.
					
					 This has imperiled global peace.
					
					 To ensure world peace and stability it is necessary to fundamentally root out threats from the U.S., wrecker of peace.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Will Never Be Able to Escape Destruction: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Will Never Be Able to Escape Destruction: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors will never be able to escape final destruction as it works hard to realize its confrontation scenario while stubbornly negating the dignified system in the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday warns this in a bylined article.
					
					 The reckless smear campaign kicked off by the Lee group was, in essence, prompted by its foolish scenario to desecrate the dignified system in the DPRK and break the single-mined unity of its society, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 All the service personnel and people, united around the leader as a blood-sealed organic body, share will and feelings, weal and woe. The leader and service personnel and people are advancing arms in arms and shoulder to shoulder as comrades-in-arms. This is the true picture of the society in the DPRK. 
					
					 The social system in the DPRK will remain unshaken in any storm and stress forever as it is developed by the popular masses on the basis of absolute trust and unity. 
					
					 This is a ridiculous political caricature for the Lee group to defame the dignified system in the DPRK from its narrow-minded viewpoint. It is as foolish an act as sweeping the sea with a broom for the poor mendicants forsaken by the people to hurt the single-minded unity of the DPRK.
					
					 The army and people have already clarified several times their stand to wipe out the group of traitors through a sacred war of Korean-style. What remains to be done is to put their pledge into practice.

articles.title: Ultra-right Conservative Media's Reckless Behavior Slashed: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Ultra-right Conservative Media's Reckless Behavior Slashed: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Ultra-right conservative media in south Korea including Dong-A Ilbo are joining the rat-like Lee Myung Bak in perpetrating such hideous provocations as deliberately distorting even the image representing the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, not content with desecrating the celebrations of the Day of the Sun.
					 Minju Joson Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is as foolish an act as volunteering to be a target of strike by the army and people of the DPRK who are all out in the sacred war of retaliation to wipe out the Lee group, the sworn enemy, to the last man.
					
					 The above-said media had better stop talking nonsense about the celebrations of the Day of the Sun if they do not want to go to their graves together with the rat-like Lee group.
					
					 Now is the time to force them to pay for all their crimes.
					
					 The ultra-right conservative media of south Korea will keenly realize what dearest prices they will have to pay for the high treason of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK which its army and people regard more valuable than their own lives.
					
					 The day is numbered when the above-said media and Lee group would be buried in their graves.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Achieving New Great Victory of Juche Revolution
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Achieving New Great Victory of Juche Revolution
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday editorially calls upon all service personnel and people to advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism and achieve a new great victory of Juche revolution, single-mindedly united close around the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					 A congratulatory speech made by Kim Jong Un at the military parade celebrating the centenary of the birth of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung proudly reviewed the 100 year history of Kim Il Sung's Korea recorded with victories and glory. It, at the same time, serves as important guidelines brightly indicating the road to be followed by the another century of Juche and a militant programme for uninterrupted revolution to be held aloft by the army and people of the DPRK to the last, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 The past 100 years covered by the Korean nation clearly proves the immutable truth that only when they are led by an outstanding leader, the country and the nation can have dignity and enjoy prosperity. It was the greatest honor and fortune for the Korean nation to have held in high esteem President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the pioneer and leader of the Songun revolution. 
					
					 Having the peerlessly great men at the helm of the revolution, there opened a new epoch of national independence and a firm foundation was provided for the prosperity of the county and the happiness of the generations to come. 
					
					 The greatness of the leader means the mightiness of the country and the nation. This truth remains unchanged in the new century of Juche.
					
					 It is the greatest honor and happiness for the army and people of the DPRK to receive the important instructions of Kim Jong Un at a turning point of the history where another century of Juche begins, having him at the top posts of the party, the state and the army of the DPRK. 
					
					 "Forward for Final Victory!", the call made by Kim Jong Un, is powerfully inspiring all the party members, service personnel and people and leading them to a new advance and steady victories.

articles.title: Crackdown on Reunification Activists by Court Accused in S. Korea
articles.content:
Crackdown on Reunification Activists by Court Accused in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Pusan High Court in south Korea held a trial on an appeal of the secretary general and former executive chairman of the Pusan Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and declared them guilty again on April 19.
					 The Intelligence Service and police authorities filed a suit against them last year after years of search, confiscation and investigation operations against them, charging that they had working contact with the North Side Committee.
					
					 The Pusan District Court sentenced them to penal servitude and detained them in February on charges of possessing "enemy-benefiting publications" and violating the "law on assembly and demonstration."
					
					 In the face of strong public protest, the court authorities could not but hold the trial on an appeal.
					
					 However, the court authorities found fault with the publications, talking about "enemy-benefiting nature." The court confirmed the ruling made at the first trial almost as it is, saying the South Side Committee is little different from the Pan-national Alliance for Korean's Reunification, an "enemy-benefiting organization."
					
					 In this regard the secretary general and former executive chairman declared that they would jointly counter the decision made by the court authorities. The decision suggests that all the activities of the organization have been regarded as "enemy-benefiting," they added.
					
					 The Pusan Headquarters of the South Side Committee and other civic and social organizations in Pusan branded the decision as a judicial terrorism against the inter-Korean declarations.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Deplores Society Rampant with Dictatorship
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Deplores Society Rampant with Dictatorship
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Kyunghyang Daily News on April 19 deplored the situation of south Korea under the dictatorial rule of traitor Lee Myung Bak.  
					 Democracy and freedom of speech are stamped out and the people's living has been pushed to a cliff due to part-time job and serious joblessness in south Korean society, the paper noted, adding that this bears a close resemblance to the situation on the eve of April 19.
					
					 The April 19 uprising broke out as people's living and economy were driven into distress and the March 15 fraudulent election lashed the   people into great fury, the paper noted, stressing that the people's resentment is now running high just as it was at that time.
					
					 The fighting spirit of the participants in the uprising who chanted slogans "Down with dictatorial regime" and "Let's achieve democracy of society and the independent reunification of the country" still lives on in the present movement for independent reunification after going through the periods of the May 18 Kwangju popular resistance and the June resistance.
					
					 It is the Lee dictatorial regime which spearheaded the illegal investigation into civilians by dint of power and money and reduced media to a propaganda tool representing the specified forces, the paper pointed out, calling upon people from all walks of life to wage a positive struggle for democracy.

articles.title: KCTU Declares Its Action Plan to Win Rights of Workers
articles.content:
KCTU Declares Its Action Plan to Win Rights of Workers
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a meeting in Seoul on April 19 to announce its action plan to win rights of workers. 
					 The KCTU declared that it would struggle to have the demands for the withdrawal of the part-time job, stop to unreasonable dismissal and the total revision of the labor law met. 
					
					 During the actions all the members of the KCTU will enter into a general strike, hold protest meetings, sit-in strike and all-people memorial service for the dead workers of Ssangyong Motors in different parts of Seoul, it declared.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Celebrate Day of Sun
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Celebrate Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Teachers and students of Joson University held a remembrance meeting for marking the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung at the university on April 16.
					 A congratulatory message to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was read out first.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting referred to the paternal loving care shown by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 They said that the exploits performed by the peerlessly great men in the history of the movement of Koreans in Japan are kept deep in the hearts of the compatriots, adding that they are living with pride as overseas citizens of the DPRK even in an alien land.
					
					 They expressed pledge to develop the university as the only base for training the new core members to firmly guarantee the issue of new generation of Chongryon, issue of inheritance under the leadership of Kim Jong Un true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Meanwhile, an event of compatriots under Chongryon in Aichi was held at Aichi Korean Middle and High School on April 15 to celebrate the centenary of the birth of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Revolutionary Career of Kim Il Sung Lauded in Peru
articles.content:
Revolutionary Career of Kim Il Sung Lauded in Peru
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Short Biography of President Kim Il Sung was carried in a special issue of a joint bulletin released by the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute and the Pyongyang Cultural Center on April 14.
					 The bulletin carried a portrait of the smiling President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Mongolian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Mongolian Paper
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea" was carried by Mongolian paper Unen on April 13.
					 The work, published on March 31, 1982, deals with the immortal historical feats President Kim Il Sung performed by founding the Juche idea and clarifies its significance, the founding of the Juche idea, its philosophical principle, socio-historical principles, guiding principles and its historical significance.
					
					 The paper carried portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, a portrait of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, a photo of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un standing together and photos of the revolutionary activities of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Election to Top Post of DPRK Hailed as Special Event
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Election to Top Post of DPRK Hailed as Special Event
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Meetings for adopting congratulatory messages and other meetings and film shows took place in Russia, Democratic Congo, Congo, Italy and Zambia between April 12 and 15 congratulating the Korean people on holding leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea forever and electing the dear respected Kim Jong Un to the top post of the WPK and the state.
					 Participants of the film shows watched Korean film "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and others.
					
					 The director of the Protocol Department of the Russian Centre for the International Scientific and Technological Bulletins said that the WPK will victoriously lead the Korean people in their struggle to build a thriving nation as it is having Kim Jong Un at the top post of the party.
					
					 Boswa Isekombe Sylvere, general secretary of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo, stressed that Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the WPK is an event of special mention as it provided a guarantee for carrying forward and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and promised a bright future of the Korean people.
					
					 Mauro Cazadio, general secretary of the Struggle for the Peace and Socialism of Italy, noted that only victory and glory are in store for the Korean people who are advancing under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Congratulatory messages and letters to him were adopted at the events in Congo, Democratic Congo and Zambia.

articles.title: Glorious History of KPA Lauded by British Organizations
articles.content:
Glorious History of KPA Lauded by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on April 7 on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of the heroic Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The KPA, which originated from the Korean People's Revolutionary Army founded in 1932, has grown to be a-match-for-a hundred ranks under the care of President Kim Il Sung, the statement said.
					
					 The KPA, which inflicted a disastrous defeat upon the U.S. imperialist aggressors during the past Fatherland Liberation War, again successfully beat them when there occurred armed spy ship "Pueblo" case, "EC-121" large spy plane case and the Panmunjom case, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The KPA which has developed into the revolutionary armed forces of Juche type is the army of the leader, the party and the working class.
					
					 The might of the KPA has grown stronger under the leadership of Kim Jong Il who pursued the Songun politics which gives top priority to the KPA, the pillar and main force of the revolution.
					
					 The KPA is equipped with latest type weapons and the DPRK had an access to powerful nuclear deterrent, it said, adding:
					
					 The 80 year-long history of the KPA is a history of victory and glory.
					
					 The KPA, the vanguard of the Songun revolution, emerged victorious in the confrontation with imperialism and will do so in the future, too, under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the KPA.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
im Il Sung's Feats Praised by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups illustrated with the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the centenary of his birth.
					 Xing San Daily of Thailand on April 6 devoted its one whole page to an article titled "DPRK, inheritance of socialist cause", which said:
					
					 The President founded the Juche idea and the Songun idea, providing a guiding ideology to socialist Korea, paving a wide avenue for socialist development and building a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence in the land of Korea.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il regarded it as his lifelong mission to accomplish the revolutionary cause pioneered by the President and dynamically advanced the socialist cause as thought and intended by him.
					
					 Respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un is now standing at the helm of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The Korean people will carry forward and accomplish the socialist cause under his leadership.
					
					 The April issue of the Bulgarian paper Iskra carried special articles titled "Founder of socialist Korea," "Giant in 20th century," etc. under the bannerline title "Centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung". The articles introduced the President's ideological and theoretical exploits and his feats in party, army and nation building.
					
					 The Ethiopian paper Reporter on April 7 carried an article titled "Kim Il Sung, shining august name on centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung". The article said that his august name means the sun, adding that it is shining as a symbol of national liberation and the era of independence and a banner of eternal victory.
					
					 The Iranian paper Iran News and the Malaysian paper Guang Ming Daily on April 9 praised the leadership traits of the President and reported about the grand celebrations of the centenary of his birth.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's August Name and Feats Lauded in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's August Name and Feats Lauded in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- An organization and personage of Ethiopia issued statements on April 13 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea said in a statement:
					
					 It is great honor for us to celebrate the centenary of the birth of the President together with the Korean people.
					
					 The President fathered the Juche idea, rallying the Korean people as a driving force for revolution, and liberated Korea and founded the independent DPRK.
					
					 He built a socialist power of Juche in Korea by successfully applying the Juche idea and encouraged progressive mankind to wage a dynamic struggle for global independence under the banner of the Juche idea.
					
					 His august name and feats will always be remembered not only by the Korean people but by the Juche idea followers and the progressives.
					
					 The chairman of the Addis Ababa Youth Association of Ethiopia in a statement praised the President for his contribution to developing the Korean youth movement. He noted:
					
					 The Korean people and youth could always take the road of victory and glory under the leadership of such great leaders as the President and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 I am firmly convinced that the Korean people and youth will build a thriving nation without fail under the Songun revolutionary leadership of respected H.E. Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: China Denies US Accusation
articles.content:
China Denies US Accusation
 Beijing, April 22 (KCNA) -- China denied Friday a U.S. accusation that the progress China has made in space exploration should be partially attributed to espionage.
					 "China deeply regrets the relevant report from the U.S. administration, and is firmly against the groundless accusation made against China," Foreign Ministry spokesman Liu Weimin said at a press briefing.
					
					 "The report mistakenly insisted on the two-decade-old satellite export restrictions against China, which was against the consensus reached between the two heads of state on enhancing space cooperation," Liu said.
					
					 The achievements made in China's space programs should be attributed to the hard pioneering work, innovation and diligence of the Chinese people, he said.
					
					 "Any restriction, imputation or defamation against China's cause of space exploration will end in vain," Liu said.

articles.title: CSTO Opposes Use of Armed Forces against Iran
articles.content:
CSTO Opposes Use of Armed Forces against Iran
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Nikolai Borzhzya, secretary of the Collective Security Treaty Organization (CSTO), addressing a recent meeting of the organization, clarified the stand opposed to the use of the armed forces against Iran.
					 Saying that the stand of the organization is clear, he declared that the CSTO would resolutely stand against the use of the armed forces.
					
					 He called for continued talks over Iran's nuclear issue.

articles.title: Different Countries Cooperate
articles.content:
Different Countries Cooperate
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- China and Thailand concluded an agreement to cement cooperation on high-speed railway construction on April 19.
					 On the same day, Russia and Vietnam agreed to boost bilateral cooperation in the military field.

articles.title: Eurozone Trade Deficit Reaches 9.4 Billion Euros
articles.content:
Eurozone Trade Deficit Reaches 9.4 Billion Euros
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- For the 27-nation EU, trade balance for February 2012 recorded a deficit of 9.4 billion euros, Eurostat said on April 16.

articles.title: US Initial Jobless Claims Level Off
articles.content:
US Initial Jobless Claims Level Off
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The advance figure for seasonally adjusted initial claims for jobless benefits was 386,000 in the week ending April 14, the U.S. Labor Department reported on April 19.

articles.title: Economic Meltdown in US, Member States of EU
articles.content:
Economic Meltdown in US, Member States of EU
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Intel reported on Apr. 17 that its profit in the most recent quarter fell nearly 13 percent.

articles.title: Se iniciara pronto la accion especial: avisa grupo de comandancia suprema
articles.content:
Se iniciara pronto la accion especial: avisa grupo de comandancia suprema
Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ACNC) -- El grupo de operaciones y acciones especiales de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea notifico el dia 23 lo siguiente: 
					Ahora llega al cielo la indignacion de nuestro ejercito y pueblo por la banda ratonesca de Lee Myung Bak, traidores surcoreanos sin parangon. 
					
					Esta indignacion se traduce en los gritos estremecedores como "Vamos a aniquilarla" y "Liquidemosla" y "Descuarticemosla".
					
					Sin embargo, los compinches del traidor Lee Myung Bak siguen andando descabellados sin volverse en si. 
					
					Durante la visita del dia 20 al "Instituto de Educacion de Reunificacion", ratonera en el barrio Suyu de Kangbuk-Ku de Seul, dijeron que "ahora el Norte (de Corea) necesita no solo el pan sino tambien la libertad y los derechos humanos" y "deberan concentrarse en el cambio del regimen norcoreano" si este no deja su voluntad de desarrollar las armas nucleares o misiles. 
					
					Ademas, se atrevieron a chismear que "para mejorar los niveles de la vida de la poblacion norcoreana, es preciso hacer a ella practicar la reforma agraria disolviendo las granjas cooperativas".
					
					Con anterioridad, especificamente, el 19 de abril, se presentaron en el Instituto de Ciencia de Defensa Nacional y acariciando unos misiles de chatarra, dijeron con fanfarronada que estos tienen una precision y poder de fuego suficientes para "atacar inmediatamente" cualquier punto de la RPDC.
					
					Para colmo, se atrevieron a hablar del "ataque a la Direccion Suprema (de la RPDC) por la ventana de oficina". 
					
					Se suman a esas acciones sumamente provocativas  el ministro de Defensa Nacional Kim Kwan Jin y otros belicistas del ejercito titere surcoreano.
					
					La realidad demuestra que la banda del traidor Lee perdio la razon hace mucho tiempo por su extremada fiebre provocativa.
					
					Por otra parte, los medios de prensa conservadores, hechos mucho antes sirvientas de la banda de Lee, estan enfrascados en reportar integramente las acciones repugnantes de esa horda de ratas.
					
					Toman parte en esta campana publicitaria los medios situados en la parte centrica de Seul como Dong-A Ilbo, KBS, MBC y YTN.
					
					La banda de traidores surcoreanos, que no podra expiar sus tremendos crimenes de traicion cometidos hasta la fecha ni con pedir disculpas mil veces y suicidarse, esta desafiando por el contrario rechinando los dientes. Puesto que la situacion se torna cada dia mas fea, el grupo de operaciones y acciones especiales de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea avisa lo siguiente bajo la autorizacion: 
					
					Notificamos que iniciara pronto la accion especial de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias para frustrar los desafios imprudentes de la banda de traidores surcoreanos.
					
					Esta accion es la explosion de la vehemente indignacion de la opinion publica encolerizada y forma parte de la sagrada guerra de todo el ejercito y el pueblo para defender nuestra maxima dignidad.
					
					Los blancos de ella son la horda del traidor Lee Myung Bak, criminal principal, y otros ratones como los medios conservadores de prensa que carcomen la imparcial opinion publica.
					
					Una vez iniciada la accion especial, la horda de ratones y los focos de provocacion se reduciran a cenizas dentro de 3-4 minutos o en lo mas rapido ante los medios y metodos a nuestro estilo, nunca vistos antes.
					
					Nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias no hablan por hablar.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak sera responsable de cualquier contingencia: MINREX
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak sera responsable de cualquier contingencia: MINREX
Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la cancilleria de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea divulgo el dia 22 la siguiente declaracion:
					Ahora en la Peninsula Coreana se crea un estado de emergencia debido a las acciones imprudentes e intolerables de la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak, enloquecida por la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Esos traidores de peor calana volvieron a insultar severamente la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Apreciar como dignidad mas valiosa que la vida el sosten espiritual y no tolerar nunca la profanacion de el, esto es el atributo connatural y noble sentimiento que comparten todos los hombres del mundo.
					
					Es una moral universal de la humanidad respetar la maxima dignidad de cada pais y nacion por encima de las diferencias de ideas, sistemas, creencias religiosas y criterios politicos.
					
					El traidor Lee cometio un tremendo acto de provocacion al manchar la sublime devocion del pueblo coreano con sus chismes de negociante mezquino como que los festejos del centenario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung tuvieron ciertos gastos con que se podria comprar una cantidad considerable de alimentos.
					
					Celebrar el centenario del nacimiento del Presidente, salvador de renacimiento de la nacion, gran hombre de la humanidad y eterno Presidente de la RPDC como maxima fiesta nacional deviene el gran jubilo en la historia de la humanidad.
					
					En lugar de felicitarla como connacional. el traidor Lee la calumnio brutalmente, lo cual prueba que este es precisamente una escoria humana de la epoca.
					
					Es natural que un tipo pase por un proceso necesario para convertirse en una escoria humana.
					
					Lee empujo al peor estado las relaciones intercoreanas caracterizadas por el fervor de reunificacion del 15 de Junio, y agravo solo la tension en la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					
					El ano pasado, la camarilla de traidores surcoreanos, como parte de su intento desesperado de bloquear la tendencia de cooperacion alimentaria con la RPDC a escala internacional, recurria a una demagogia tan absurda de que "el Norte (RPDC) ahorra el alimento para los actos por el Dia del Sol". En aquel tiempo, ya hemos calificado al traidor Lee de deformado humano mental y fisicamente.
					
					Ahora, los militares y civiles de la RPDC estan rechinando los dientes por el hecho de que la banda traidora difamo gravemente al Padre de la nacion considerado como Sol y esperan con ansiedad la orden de castigarlos de manera despiadada.
					
					Hasta las mujeres modestas de este pais, conocido como pais del Oriente de buena cortesia, alzan sus voces de condena: "Aniquilemos a la horda de ratones de Lee Myung Bak".
					
					Es unanime la opinion de eliminar cuanto antes a esta horda, que hace todos sus esfuerzos desesperados tomando la confrontacion fratricida como su unico modo de sobrevivir, porque es un tumor maligno que dana la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno.
					
					En la actualidad, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se ha hecho incontrolable por la desesperacion del traidor Lee en agonia politica.
					
					Frente a la situacion creada, la cancilleria de la RPDC declara solemnemente que le caera totalmente a la traidor Lee la responsabilidad de posible desencadenamiento de cualquier incidente en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Si un pais pretende intervenir en los asuntos internos de nuestra nacion por ser aliado o acompanante apoyando a las escorias humanas que pisotearon brutalmente hasta la etica y  la moralidad, no evitara la punta de bayoneta de nuestro ejercito y pueblo tan indignados.

					La nueva acusacion de Lee Myung Bak a la RPDC es tan ridicula como el ladrido de perro rabioso y tan miserable como el gemido de una rata pisoteada por la multitud siendo castigada por sus maldades.

articles.title: Amistad China-Corea es patrimonio de ambos paises: Dai Bingguo
